mdRecord.dcterms:title: James & Ruth Smith Cemetery
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Located at 3772 Franklin Pike at the end of a very long driveway. The cemetery sits just to the right of the house just beyond a tree line. Once you go thru the tree line you may be on property owned by the John Douglas Living Trust. Cemetery is visible on Google Earth. N 36 56.478' W 80 11.687'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
